item.title: Brandie add a quote by John O'Donohue
item.description: "Your soul knows the geography of your destiny. Your soul alone has the map of your future, therefore you can trust this indirect, oblique side of yourself. If you do, it will take you where you need to go, but more important it will teach you a kindness of rhythm in your journey." -- John O'Donohue

item.title: Brandie add a quote by Stephanie Pearl-McPhee
item.description: "100 years ago, buying something you could make was considered wasteful; now making something you could buy is considered wasteful. I am not convinced this is a step in the right direction." -- Stephanie Pearl-McPhee
